body:
Please correct the typo and add spaces for readability.
`in_depth*channel_muliplier` -> `in_depth * channel_multiplier`

This file also haven't mentioned `channel_multiplier` before, so please also explain that this means the `out_depth` of the filter shape.
body_html:
Please correct the typo and add spaces for readability.
in_depth*channel_muliplier -> in_depth * channel_multiplier

This file also haven't mentioned channel_multiplier before, so please also explain that this means the out_depth of the filter shape.
body_text:
Please correct the typo and add spaces for readability.
in_depth*channel_muliplier -> in_depth * channel_multiplier
This file also haven't mentioned channel_multiplier before, so please also explain that this means the out_depth of the filter shape.
